import Agneepath from '../images/agneepath.jpg' import Friendzone from '../images/Friendzone.jpg' import Dora from '../images/dora.jpg' import Aladdin from '../images/Aladdin.jpg' import {useState} from 'react' import React from 'react' function MovieCard({movies}) { const Add =() => [...movies,('title','posterURL' , 'rating','description')] const [ Movies,setMovies ]=useState( [ {title: 'Agneepath' ,posterURL : Agneepath ,rating:' ' , description:' ' ,}, {title: 'Friendzone' ,posterURL : Friendzone ,rating:'' , description:'' ,}, { title: 'dora' ,posterURL : Dora ,rating:'' , description:'' ,} , { title: 'Aladdin' ,posterURL : Aladdin ,rating:'' , description:'' ,} ]) return (
{Movies.map((el)=>(

{el.rating}

{el.title}

{el.description}

) ) } {/* input Add */} this.setState({movies: e.target.value}) } > this.setState({movies: e.target.value}) } > this.setState({movies: e.target.value}) } > this.setState({movies: e.target.value}) } >
) } export default MovieCard
